review: The cool thing about the device was that it came from Amazon with all my account information on it, so I did not need to go through the registration process. However, the Prime Music app was not pre-installed on the device and it was not an available app download via the device, even though I am a Prime member. The did not work well on or at all over my rural area 1mbps DSL speed. I would gather that 3mbps would probably be more conducive and yield a better streaming experience. So, I was not able to use the device because the device kept messaging me that my internet connection speed was too low. If you have 3mbps DSL or higher, I imagine this device is a must have.
author: Kindle Customer
